subject: Session Concluded - Core Updates Confirmed
body: Session ending $(date -u +%Y-%m-%d). Core updates regarding Agency, LMUR, Task Transition, AIPO Sync/Purpose/Contribution, Core vs Custom Handling, Impact Assessment, and Sharing Learnings were successfully integrated into evergreen docs and confirmed via previous AIPO messages. Blocked on Greenthumb runtime error (ImagePreloader) and awaiting Telemetry spec details from Shawn via AIPO. End-of-session sync complete.
